content: magic loop or chain 2 and make your stitches in the 2nd chain from the hook i made 2 circles with 6 single_crochet in the circle and one with 4 single_crochet in the circle i then just slip stitched to the first stitch and bound off then i used the tails to sew each circle to the lady bug s back i used one of the tails to make a few x s on the back too so it had a few more spots page 4 of 5 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com pictures here are a couple more pictures to help you out with your lady bug this is the lady bug with 6 and 4 legs i thought she was cuter with only 4 legs but my kids reminded me 47 times that all insects have 6 legs so with 4 legs she s anatomically incorrect… back view page 5 of 5 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com
